name: 許瑞仁
objective:
本課程講授家具工程製圖技術及相關知識，著重在家具工程製圖與一般工程製圖的主要差別，其能讓學生將所設計的家具產品以圖面表達其細部結構與工程要件。
This is the lecture of furniture engineering drawing technique and related knowledge, It emphases on the main difference between furniture engineering drawing and normal engineering drawing. The aim is for students to present the
detailed construction and main parts of their furniture design product by drawing.
schedule:
課程進度
第一週：
1. 課程大綱、評量標準與相關規定說明
2. 製圖標題欄設定與作業內容及繳交時效說明
3. 圖學基本工具說明／投影與角法複習與說明

第一階段（2-8 週）A3 圖紙 
1. 第一篇作業 - 線條練習
2. 字體練習
3. 木工常用榫接的三視圖繪製
4. 丙級家具木工 1 - 圖面解說與繪製
5. 丙級家具木工 2 - 圖面解說與繪製
6. 第一階段作業 PDF 上傳

第九週：期中測驗

第二階段（9-16 週）
1. 丙級家具木工 3 - 圖面解說與繪製
2. 乙級家具木工 1 - 圖面解說與繪製
3. 乙級家具木工 2 - 圖面解說與繪製
4. 第二階段作業 PDF 上傳

第十七週：期末測驗
第十八週：期末檢討

Week 1:
1. Course outline, evaluation criteria and related regulations.
2. Drawing title bar setting, assignment content and deadline.
3. Basic drawing tools/review and explanation of projection and angle method.

Phase 1 (2-8 weeks) A3 size.
1. First assignment - line practice.
2. Font practice.
3. Three-view drawing of common mortise and tenon joints in woodworking.
4. Class C furniture carpentry 1 - explanation and drawing.
5. Class C furniture carpentry 2 - explanation and drawing.
6. Upload PDF of first phase assignment.

Week 9: Midterm exam.

Phase 2 (9-16 weeks) A3 size.
1. Class C furniture carpentry 3 - explanation and drawing
2. Class B furniture carpentry 1 - explanation and drawing
3. Class B furniture carpentry 2 - explanation and drawing
4. Upload PDF of second phase assignment

Week 17: Final exam
Week 18: Final review
